qas.question: What does NCAZ take care of?
What is the purpose of NCAZ?

answers.text: to detect and prevent attacks against the national infrastructure

qas.question: Why does Berlin start a National Cyber Defense Initiative?

plausible_answers.text: to detect and prevent attacks against the national infrastructure

qas.question: Why does NCAZ work closely with BSI?
Who takes care of national security?
What incidents are it to prevent?
Where is the German Minister for Home Affairs located?
When did the incident in Stuxnet happen?

plausible_answers.text: the German Minister for Home Affairs
to detect and prevent attacks against the national infrastructure

qas.question: What is the primary task of the Minister for Home Affairs?

context: <b10_0>Berlin<b10_0/> starts National Cyber Defense Initiative: On <a2_0>June 16, 2011<a2_0/>, <b13_0>the German Minister for Home Affairs<b13_0/>, officially opened the new German NCAZ (National Center for Cyber Defense) <a0_0>Nationales Cyber-Abwehrzentrum<a0_0/> located in <b12_0>Bonn<b12_0/>. The NCAZ closely cooperates with BSI (Federal Office for Information Security) Bundesamt für Sicherheit in der Informationstechnik, BKA (Federal Police Organisation) Bundeskriminalamt (Deutschland), BND (Federal Intelligence Service) Bundesnachrichtendienst, <b7_0>MAD<b7_0/> (Military Intelligence Service) Amt für den Militärischen Abschirmdienst and other national organisations in Germany taking care of <a1_0><b5_0>national security aspects<a1_0/>.<b5_0/> According to the Minister the primary task of the new organisation founded on <a3_0><b11_0>February 23, 2011<b11_0/><a3_0/>, is <a4_0><b6_0><b14_0>to detect and prevent <b9_0>attacks against the national infrastructure<b14_0/><b9_0/><b6_0/><a4_0/> and mentioned incidents like <b8_0>Stuxnet<b8_0/>.
